description:
Evil Emperor Buggler is plotting to take over the universe, only the 8 Bomberman heroes can save the day. 
Story Mode is an exciting single player or co-op adventure with 50 levels to clear and awesome bosses to defeat. Featuring traditional Bomberman gameplay along with all-new 3D levels and features.
Battle Mode is the classic Bomberman multiplayer experience for up to 8 players. Compete locally, or go online and battle with friends and rivals from around the world. The rules are simple - The last Bomberman standing wins.
name: Super Bomberman R
